amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit any Federal funds appropriated in the Act to be used to carry out any program of distributing sterile needles or syringes for the hypodermic injection of any illegal drug.

action.text: Moran (VA) amendment (A008) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Moran (VA) amendment (A008) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 247 (Roll No. 413).
